offlineimportlexicon-desc: Offline import lexicon into Semantic MediaWiki
offlineimportlexicon-initial-text: This page helps user to harvest lexicon' entities using minimal metadata set
offlineimportlexicon-content-1: Please insert the title of the lexicon (mandatory).
offlineimportlexicon-content-2: Please insert the short title of the lexicon. This is standardized as "year of publication of first volume"-"year of publication of last volume (without century)"-"last name of editor like: 1858-65-Wörle-Schumann (mandatory).
offlineimportlexicon-content-3: Please insert the subtitle of the lexicon.
offlineimportlexicon-content-4: Please insert the place of publication. Multiple values should be separated by "; " (mandatory).
offlineimportlexicon-content-5: Please insert the year of publication. Multiple values should be separated by "; " (mandatory).
offlineimportlexicon-content-6: Please insert the editor(s) by inserting first name and second name separated by ", " (Firstname, Secondname; ...). Multiple values should be separated by "; " (mandatory).
offlineimportlexicon-content-7: Please insert the publisher. Multiple values should be separated by "; ".
offlineimportlexicon-content-8: Please insert the edition of the lexicon.
offlineimportlexicon-content-9: Please insert the language of the lexicon like ger (ISO 639-2).
offlineimportlexicon-content-10: Please choose the amount of volumes.
offlineimportlexicon-content-21: Please insert the title of the volume (mandatory).
offlineimportlexicon-content-22: Please insert the subtitle of the volume.
offlineimportlexicon-content-23: Please insert the place of publication. Multiple values should be separated by "; " (mandatory).
offlineimportlexicon-content-24: Please insert the year of publication (mandatory).
offlineimportlexicon-content-25: Please insert the editor(s) by inserting first name and second name separated by ", " (Firstname, Secondname; ...). Multiple values should be separated by "; " (mandatory).
offlineimportlexicon-content-26: Please insert the publisher. Multiple values should be separated by "; ".
offlineimportlexicon-content-27: Please insert the language of the lexicon like ger (ISO 639-2).
offlineimportlexicon-content-28: Please insert the number of volume (like 1).
offlineimportlexicon-content-29: Insert a further description of the lexicon.
offlineimportlexicon-content-31: Insert the title of the volume lemma (mandatory).
offlineimportlexicon-content-32: Choose the type of the article like Lemma, TableOfContent, Article, Preface or Titlepage (mandatory).
offlineimportlexicon-content-33: Please insert the subtitle of the lemma.
offlineimportlexicon-content-34: Please insert the name of the author(s) by inserting first name and second name separted with ", " (Firstname, Secondname; ...). Multiple values should be separated by "; " (mandatory).
offlineimportlexicon-content-35: Please insert the amount of pages counted from the beginning of the book to the beginning of the article (mandatory).
offlineimportlexicon-content-355: Please insert the language of the lexicon like ger (ISO 639-2).
offlineimportlexicon-content-36: Please insert the amount of pages counted from the beginning of the book to the end of the article (mandatory).
offlineimportlexicon-content-37: Please insert the number which is written on the book's page on the beginning of the article like: 30 or XI.
offlineimportlexicon-content-38: Please insert the number which is written on the book's page at the ending of the article like 30 or XI.
offlineimportlexicon-content-39: Please insert the name of the images. For prior uploaded images, please provide the full path of the wiki-url containing short name and volume (1840-42-Münch-Volume-01-00000015.jpg). The URL of the image should be created like "short name of the lexicon"-Volume-"volumenumber"-"00000015.jpg (=counted physical pages in book)
offlineimportlexicon-content-40: Please insert a free text about the lexicon's royalty rights.
right-offlineimportlexicon: Create wiki pages with lexicon data
